title: Fizz' stripper pole needs to go
body: You see, what I don't get is why Riot decides to do a rework and does nothing about the most idiotic aspect of said champ. Dumb ass abilities like Fizz' E should be removed from the game. Let's include {{champion:23}} {{champion:10}} as well although Fizz' E is ten times dumber than any of these champs while being on 1/100 of the cooldown.

replies.body: The only thing that needs to go is this shitpost.

> [{quoted}](name=MissingKayo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-28T01:42:20.960+0000)
>
> The only thing that needs to go is this shitpost.

Not surprised to see a comment like yours. Fizz main I presume?

> [{quoted}](name=MissingKayo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-28T02:54:16.744+0000)
>
> lolno

Pretty sure you are though.

If I weren't so late to the party I would have said something similar, and, news flash, not a Fizz player.  one game ever as Fizz, Fizz free work in ARAM, fed out my ass because i'd never touched an assassin before.  People can disagree with you or think your opinion is flat out wrong without being Fizz mains.

> [{quoted}](name=4maskwolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-28T09:01:46.683+0000)
>
> If I weren't so late to the party I would have said something similar, and, news flash, not a Fizz player.  one game ever as Fizz, Fizz free work in ARAM, fed out my ass because i'd never touched an assassin before.  People can disagree with you or think your opinion is flat out wrong without being Fizz mains.

Pretty sure y'all have played Fizz more than that.
It saddens me that you can be so delusional that anyone who dares disagree with you has to be a Fizz main.

> [{quoted}](name=4maskwolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-28T17:50:27.170+0000)
>
> It saddens me that you can be so delusional that anyone who dares disagree with you has to be a Fizz main.

Sorry, but I don't see why anyone not playing Fizz would defend his E, which is the epitome of dumb and everything wrong with this game.

(at 0% cdr)
Trynd's R has a cd of 110/100/90
Kayle's R has a cd of 100/90/80
Fizz's E has a cd of 10/9.5/9/8.5/8
By lvl 9, Fizz's E is 7,27% the cd of Trynd's R and 8% the cd of Kayle's R
> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-28T01:31:51.359+0000)
>
>  while being on 1/100 of the cooldown.

> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-28T01:31:51.359+0000)
>
> You see, what I don&#039;t get is why Riot decides to do a rework and does nothing about the most idiotic aspect of said champ. Dumb ass abilities like Fizz&#039; E should be removed from the game. Let&#039;s include {{champion:23}} {{champion:10}} as well although Fizz&#039; E is ten times dumber than any of these champs while being on 1/100 of the cooldown.

All you've said in this mercifully short rant is that the trident ability is stupid.  How about actual reasons it's " bad"?

> [{quoted}](name=Stormshadow3503,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xpNdEaBd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-28T01:51:51.492+0000)
>
> All you've said in this mercifully short rant is that the trident ability is stupid.  How about actual reasons it's " bad"?

Because it's retarded to be able to do a mistake and with the click of one button it's all good? If it was an ultimate ability, cool, but it's a short CD ability that you can spam 24/7 which deals damage AND makes you untargetable AND synergizes extremely well with Zonya's. That doesn't seem a little retarded to you for a non-ultimate ability?

Fizz is too safe of a champion.
Fizz isn't even a problem anymore with how much healing a shielding riot gave us.
